00066 #define HTML_DIALOG(filename) \
00067 { \
00068     CHTMLDialog *dlg = new CHTMLDialog( filename, 0, "HTML_DIALOG" ); \
00069     dlg->exec(); \
00070     delete dlg; \
00071 };
